name: A Vampyre Story: Year One
blurb: A Vampyre Story:Year One graphic adventure puts you in the role of lonely Mona, a reluctant vampire trapped in a castle by her master.

rewards.reward: FORTUNE TELLER -  \r\n Download of "A Vampyre Story: Year One" - PC  \r\n\u2022 Admission to Beta testing team \u2022 Exclusive access to backer forum
BANSHEE All previous rewards, plus \u2022 digital download of A Vampyre Story Original Sound Track by Pedro Macedo Camacho  \u2022 FREE copy of A Vampyre Story from the future Autumn Moon Web Store

GARGOYLE - All previous rewards plus: \u2022 Game's digital soundtrack by renowned composer Pedro Macedo Camacho \u2022 Digital headshot of Mona from the Paris Opera.\u2022  MP3 of the First Episode of A Vampyre Story Radio Show \u2022 Video lesson on How to Sculpt Models for Video Games the Autumn Moon Way \u2022 Your name in the "Special Thanks" section of the game credits.

FULL MOON  - All previous reward tiers, plus \u2022 Digital download PDF of A Vampyre Story: Year One storyboards and script  \u2022 ten (copyright free) pirate themed background PSD files illustrated by Bill Tiller for use as desktop backgrounds or fan created graphic adventure locations

GHOUL - All previous rewards plus: \u2022 A digital PDF version of the book "Art of a Vampyre Story: Year One", featuring concept art, story boards, 3D character renders, pin-up gallery by guest artists, and sheet music from the game \u2022 MP3 of the Second Episode of A Vampyre Story Radio Drama \u2022 Video lesson on How to Rig Models the Autumn Moon Way \u2022 Digital photocopy of Froderick's butt (or AVS themed computer desktop images if that isn't your kind of thing)

LAKE MONSTER - All previous rewards plus: \u2022 A physical Poster Map of Draxsylvania \u2022 Digital PDF Book: Atlas of Draxsylvania, with color maps, art and descriptions of the history and geography of Draxsylvania, and its macabre denizens \u2022 Video lesson on How to Design Animated Characters the Autumn Moon Way \u2022 A physical Sheet of A Vampyre Story Stickers.

NOSFERATU - All previous reward tiers, plus \u2022 Special 'throw back' collector's game box (circa 1997) including a disc of the game, color game manual (and other added goodies) signed by Bill Tiller and the team! \u2022 MP3 of the Third Episode of A Vampyre Story Radio Drama \u2022 Video lesson on How to Illustrate The Bill Tiller Way \u2022 Small original 4.25" x 5.5" sketch card by Bill Tiller

EVIL WITCH - All previous rewards, plus \u2022 Special 'throw back' collector's game box of the Original A Vampyre Story including a disc of the game, color game manual, signed by Bill Tiller and the team! \u2022 Backer T-Shirt with A Vampyre Story: Year One poster graphic on the front \u2022 A deck of seventy-eight custom A Vampyre Story themed tarot cards.

OPERA STAR - All previous reward tiers, plus \u2022 Limited hardcover edition of "The Art of A Vampyre Story: Year One" signed by Bill Tiller \u2022 A 7.5" x 10" pencil drawing by Bill Tiller \u2022 Mona and Froderick's voice on your answering machine or voice mail

VAMPYRE HUNTER - All previous reward tiers, plus \u2022 High-quality 3D figurine of Mona with Froderick. \u2022 Your likeness in the game! \u2022 Song sung for you by Froderick the Bat, about the subject of your choice

VAMPYRE LORD - All previous rewards, plus \u2022 Mona stops Froderick singing for and or about you (if you want). \u2022 A 3D cartoon model of you created in Maya or Max, textured and rigged by Autumn Moon Artists

PHANTOM LOVER - All previous rewards, plus \u2022 Unique digital A Vampyre Story themed illustration and print by Bill Tiller \u2022 Live phone call with Mona, Bill, and, unfortunately, Froderick \u2022 Your model animated by Autumn Moon animators based on your direction.
ANNOYING BAT SIDEKICK - All previous reward tiers, plus \u2022 Large A Vampyre Story themed acrylic painting by Bill Tiller \u2022
